title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders, including banking experts, financial advisors, and potential users.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including AI models (specifically mentioning machine learning libraries like TensorFlow or PyTorch), data pipelines (describe tools like Apache Kafka or Apache Beam), integration with banking systems (provide details about APIs used and security measures), and infrastructure requirements (mention cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure). Consider scalability, security, and performance aspects. Include detailed design documentation, focusing on modularity for easier maintenance and extensibility, and providing clear interfaces between components. Provide a timeline for different stages of the architecture design.

title: Data Collection and Preprocessing
description: Identify and collect relevant data sources, such as transaction histories, user profiles, and financial market data. Preprocess and clean the data for use in the AI models.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for predicting financial needs, automating savings, and providing personalized financial advice based on the collected data.

title: Revised User Interface Design for PredictiveBankingAI
description: Design the user interface for the PredictiveBankingAI application. The design should prioritize user experience, accessibility, branding guidelines, seamless integration with the backend system, responsiveness across various devices and platforms. Include wireframes, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups as deliverables. Additionally, ensure that the design is informed by User Experience Research feedback and takes into account future integration of AI predictive functionalities. Collaborate with a UX/UI specialist during the design process to ensure a user-centric approach, and consider involving other relevant team members such as the Project Manager, Task Decomposer, or Backend Developer for further insights. This RFC is currently in REVIEW state, seeking feedback from the assigned Code Architect.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface using modern web technologies, integrating with the backend systems and AI models.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend systems, including APIs, data processing pipelines, and integration with banking systems.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for Predictive Banking AI that securely stores user data, transaction histories, financial goals, and other relevant information. Ensure compliance with GDPR, PCI-DSS, and other relevant regulations while considering scalability, efficient querying, and eventual consistency for real-time analysis of spending patterns and life events. Leverage cloud-based solutions (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) for cost efficiency, scalability, and flexibility. The database design should take into account the needs of various system components such as AI models and personalized financial advice algorithms. Collaborate with the Data Modeling and Requirements Analysis team to finalize the data model. Consider using a managed service like Amazon Redshift or Google BigQuery for the data warehouse, and MongoDB Atlas or Azure Cosmos DB for the operational database for improved flexibility and scalability. Ensure that the design supports horizontal scaling for handling large volumes of data and provides high availability to maintain system reliability. Also, consider using encryption at rest and in transit to further secure sensitive user data. Lastly, ensure that the design is compatible with big data processing frameworks like Apache Spark or Presto for advanced analytics. Update the rfc_state field to 'READY_FOR_CODE_REVIEW' when the database schema design is complete and ready for review by the code-architect.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations, such as data privacy laws and financial regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, monitoring, scaling strategies, and implementation of best practices for containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes), and infrastructure as code (Terraform). The infrastructure should be designed to handle potential traffic spikes during periods of high user activity.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users. Establish user support channels and processes.
